ygData.subject: Re: Enter Killfest
ygData.msgSnippet: From way further back behind a fallen log the two Stunticons crouch to avoid being detected. Suprisingly Wildrider is rather quiet, but also notably nervous.

Subject: Re: Enter Killfest
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

From way further back behind a fallen log the two Stunticons crouch to
avoid being detected. Suprisingly Wildrider is rather quiet, but also
notably nervous. "Whoa, Astro-Train's still being cocky" he whispers to
Drag Strip.
